General.Name: Al Aqar Healthcare Reit
General.Description: Al-`Aqar was listed on the Main Market of Bursa Malaysia Securities Berhad (Bursa Malaysia) on 10 August 2006. Al-`Aqar is managed by Damansara REIT Managers Sdn Berhad (DRMSB or the Manager), a wholly owned subsidiary of Johor Corporation (JCorp) and supported by KPJ Group. Al-`Aqar was established with an initial portfolio of 6 properties, and today, it has grown to 24 properties, comprising 17 hospitals and 4 wellness/health centres, 2 colleges in Malaysia and 1 aged care & retirement village in Australia.
